skill.name: devflow-constitution-quick-ref
skill.description: Quick reference guide to CC-DevFlow Constitution v2.0.0 with links to full text. Covers all 10 Articles and Phase -1 Gates.

skill.author: Dimon94

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing only markdown reference content. No executable code, no network operations, no file system modifications, and no external command execution. This is a read-only knowledge base for CC-DevFlow constitution rules.

content.user_title: Look up DevFlow constitution rules instantly
content.value_statement: DevFlow projects need quick access to quality and architectural standards. This skill provides instant lookup of all 10 constitution articles and phase gates with enforcement mechanisms and violation examples.
actual_capabilities: Look up all 10 constitution articles with key rules and examples
Verify enforcement mechanisms (guardrails, scripts, agent checks)
Identify constitution violations with correction alternatives
Quick lookup by scenario (TODO, hardcoded secrets, abstraction decisions)
Navigate to full constitution document for detailed reading
limitations: Does not contain full constitution text - only quick reference summaries
Cannot enforce constitution rules directly - only provides information
Requires other guardrail skills for real-time enforcement

use_cases.title: Check compliance before implementation
use_cases.description: Agents verify quality rules, security requirements, and architectural standards before writing code.

use_cases.title: Review phase gates and enforcement
use_cases.description: Architects review simplicity gates, abstraction rules, and integration testing requirements.

use_cases.title: Identify constitution violations
use_cases.description: Reviewers look up violation examples for TODO markers, hardcoded secrets, and scope creep.

prompt_templates.title: Quick Article Lookup
prompt_templates.prompt: What does Article [I-X] say about [topic] in DevFlow constitution?

prompt_templates.title: Check Violation
prompt_templates.prompt: Is [action] allowed in DevFlow? What are the rules and alternatives?

prompt_templates.title: Phase Gate Requirements
prompt_templates.prompt: What are the phase -1 gates and how are they enforced in DevFlow?

prompt_templates.title: Enforcement Mechanisms
prompt_templates.prompt: How is Article [I-X] enforced? What guardrails or scripts apply?

output_examples.input: Can I add a TODO comment to complete later?
output: ❌ NO - Article I.1: No Partial Implementation
Alternative: Complete implementation now, or remove from scope

best_practices: Use this skill before implementing to verify architectural decisions against constitution rules
Check phase -1 gates during project planning to ensure simplicity and anti-abstraction compliance
Look up enforcement mechanisms to understand how violations are caught and prevented
anti_patterns: Adding TODO/FIXME placeholders - violates Article I quality first principle
Creating premature abstractions like BaseController - violates Article VIII anti-abstraction
Hardcoding API keys or secrets - violates Article III security first requirement

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with all Claude Code versions?
faq.answer: Works with Claude Code CLI. Designed for CC-DevFlow v2.0.0 workflow integration.

faq.question: What are the limits of this skill?
faq.answer: Provides reference only - does not enforce rules or modify files. Use guardrail skills for enforcement.

faq.question: How does this integrate with other DevFlow skills?
faq.answer: Complements constitution-guardian and devflow-tdd-enforcer by providing rule context and explanations.

faq.question: Does this skill collect or transmit any data?
faq.answer: No - pure read-only reference guide with no network, file modification, or data collection capabilities.

faq.question: Why is my TODO being blocked?
faq.answer: Article I.1 prohibits partial implementation. Remove TODO and complete feature, or defer to separate REQ-ID.

faq.question: How is this different from project-constitution.md?
faq.answer: project-constitution.md contains full text. This skill provides quick summaries, links, and scenario-based lookup.
